com.vdurmont.emoji

Class EmojiManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vdurmont.emoji.EmojiManager

  • public class EmojiManager
extends Object
    Holds the loaded emojis and provides search functions.
    Author:
    Vincent DURMONT [vdurmont@gmail.com]

      • isOnlyEmojis

        public static boolean isOnlyEmojis(String string)
        Tests if a given String only contains emojis.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to test
        Returns:
        true if the string only contains emojis, false else

      • isEmoji

        public static EmojiTrie.Matches isEmoji(char[] sequence)
        Checks if sequence of chars contain an emoji.
        Parameters:
        sequence - Sequence of char that may contain emoji in full or partially.
        Returns:
        <li> Matches.EXACTLY if char sequence in its entirety is an emoji </li> <li> Matches.POSSIBLY if char sequence matches prefix of an emoji </li> <li> Matches.IMPOSSIBLE if char sequence matches no emoji or prefix of an emoji </li>
